thm unima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cima(c0, cun(c2, c3)), cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3))))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(c0, cun(c2, c3)), cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3)), w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl6bbr(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3))))
  bitr4d(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3))), wo(wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  syl6bb(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wo(wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, cun(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wrex(hs1, cun(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, c1), wss(cun(c2, c3), c1))
  simp1(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1))
  3adant1(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1), wss(cun(c2, c3), c1))
  unssd(c2, c3, c1, wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)))
  simpl(wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1))
  simpr(wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, cun(c2, c3), cv(hs0))
  rexun(hs1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  orbi12d(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  3adant3(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  3adant2(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3)), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c3, cv(hs0))
  elun(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3)))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cun(c2, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

thm unima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c0 "(c2 ‚ãÉ c3))=((c0 " c2)‚ãÉ(c0 " c3)))

  syl2anc((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚àà(c0 "(c2 ‚ãÉ c3))‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÉ c3),(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)), c0[Fn]c1, (c2 ‚ãÉ c3)‚äÜ c1)

  3adant1(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚äÜ c1, (c2 ‚ãÉ c3)‚äÜ c1)
  unssd(c2, c3, c1, (c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  simpl(c2 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  simpr(c2 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚äÜ c1)

  3adant3(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚äÜ c1, (hs0 ‚àà(c0 " c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c2, hs0)
  3adant2(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚äÜ c1, (hs0 ‚àà(c0 " c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c3,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c3, hs0)
  elun(hs0, (c0 " c2), (c0 " c3))

  diff.hs0.c(((c0 " c2)‚ãÉ(c0 " c3)))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

blocks.name: rnmptfi
blocks.content: The range of a function with finite domain is finite. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: fresin2
blocks.content: Restriction of a function with respect to the intersection with its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: ffi
blocks.content: A function with finite domain is finite. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: suprnmpt
blocks.content: An explicit bound for the range of a bounded function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm suprnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2[‚â§]c0)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2[‚â§]s1)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 = sup(ran(c3), ‚Ñù, <)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2[‚â§]c0))
  syl5eqel(c0, cr, sup(ran(c3), ‚Ñù, <), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, sup(ran(c3), ‚Ñù, <)‚àà ‚Ñù, ran(c3)‚äÜ ‚Ñù, ran(c3)‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3), hs0[‚â§]s1)))
  exlimdd(s0, w0, ran(c3)‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà c1)
  nfne(s0, ran(c3), emptycls)
  nfrn(s0, c3)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà c1), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  n0(s0, c1)
  suprcl(s1, hs0, ran(c3))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2[‚â§]c0)
  syl6breqr(c2, cle, c0, sup(ran(c3), ‚Ñù, <), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  syl31anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), c2[‚â§]sup(ran(c3), ‚Ñù, <), ran(c3)‚äÜ ‚Ñù, ran(c3)‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3), hs0[‚â§]s1)), c2 ‚àà ran(c3))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, ran(c3)‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  syl(w0, ran(c3)‚äÜ ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  rnmptss(s0, c1, c2, cr, c3)
  ne0d(ran(c3), c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3), hs0[‚â§]s1)))
  mpd(w0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3), hs0[‚â§]s1)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2[‚â§]s1)))
  rexlimd(s1, cr, w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2[‚â§]s1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ran(c3), hs0[‚â§]s1)))

thm mptelpm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cpm, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cpm, c3)), wa(wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3)))
  jca(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3))
  mpbid(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  feq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  eqsstrd(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3, c0, w0)
  dmmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cpm, c3)), wa(wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3))), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c5))
  elpm2g(c2, c4, c3, c5, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

thm rnmptpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c5), wceq(c7, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(crn(c0), cpr(c1, c2)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)))))
  alrimiv(hs0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  3bitrd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  a1i(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  elrnmpt(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, cpr(c3, c5), c7)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c6))
  rexprg(s0, c3, c4, c5, c6, wceq(cv(hs0), c7), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c7, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c7, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c5))
  a1i(w0, wb(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  bicomi(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)))
  elpr(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  dfcleq(hs0, crn(c0), cpr(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c1, c2))
}

thm rnmptpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ran(c0)= { c1, c2 })

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {

  alrimiv(hs0, w0, (hs0 ‚àà ran(c0)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà { c1, c2 }))

  ax-mp((hs0 ‚àà ran(c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà { c3, c5 }, hs0 = c7)), hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elrnmpt(s0, hs0, universe, c0, { c3, c5 }, c7)
  syl2anc(w0, (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà { c3, c5 }, hs0 = c7)‚Üî(hs0 = c1 ‚à® hs0 = c2)), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c6)
  rexprg(s0, c3, c4, c5, c6, hs0 = c7, hs0 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c7, c1, s0 = c3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c7, c2, s0 = c5)
  a1i(w0, ((hs0 = c1 ‚à® hs0 = c2)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà { c1, c2 }))
  bicomi((hs0 = c1 ‚à® hs0 = c2), hs0 ‚àà { c1, c2 })

thm founiiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  syl2anc(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpl(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpr(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  foelrni(s0, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  reximi(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqimss2(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  iunss2(hs0, s0, c2, c1, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  syl(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wss(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0))), wral(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, wfo(c0, c1, c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c1, c0, c2, wfo(c0, c1, c2))
  fof(c0, c1, c2)
  ssidd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  rspcev(hs0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  iunss2(s0, hs0, c1, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))

thm founiiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚Üí ‚ãÉ c2 = ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2)‚Üî((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ran(c0)= c2))

  bitrd((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ran(c0)= c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))} = c2)
  syl((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (ran(c0)= c2 ‚Üî { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))} = c2), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeq1d(ran(c0), c2, { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))}, c0[Fn]c1)
  eqtrd(ran(c0), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))}, { s0 | ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` hs0))}, c0[Fn]c1)

  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  eqeq2d(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` s1), hs0 = s1)
  fveq2(hs0, s1, c0)
  3bitr4g((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))} = c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))), ‚àÄ(s0,(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üî s0 ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))))
  albidv(s0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üî s0 ‚àà c2), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))))
  syl6rbbr((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üî s0 ‚àà c2), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))), ((‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))‚Üí s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))))

thm elrnmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crn(c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, crn(c2), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  rexbid(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c0, c4))
  nfeq(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm rnmptssrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c1, c3)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c1, c3))), wcel(c1, c4))
  elrnmpt(s1, c1, c4, cmpt(s1, c2, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))
  rnmptss(s0, c0, c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.crn.s(s0, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c2, c3)
}

thm rnmptssrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))‚äÜ ran((s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)

thm rnsnf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crn(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, csn(c1), c3))
} = {
  eqtrd(crn(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)), crn(csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))), w0)
  rneqd(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), w0)
  3eqtr4d(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cfv(c0, c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cfv(c0, c1))))
  mpteq2ia(hs0, csn(c1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(c0, cv(hs0), c1, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c1)
  feqmptd(hs0, c0, csn(c1), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), universe))
  fvexd(c0, c1, w0)
  fmptsn(hs0, c1, c2, cfv(c0, c1), universe)
  syl(w0, wceq(crn(csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))), csn(cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(c1, c2))
  rnsnopg(c1, c2, cfv(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: wessf1ornlem
blocks.content: Given a function ` F ` on a well-ordered domain ` A ` there exists a subset of ` A ` such that ` F ` restricted to such subset is injective and onto the range of ` F ` (without using the axiom of choice). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: wessf1orn
blocks.content: Given a function ` F ` on a well-ordered domain ` A ` there exists a subset of ` A ` such that ` F ` restricted to such subset is injective and onto the range of ` F ` (without using the axiom of choice). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm wessf1orn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0), crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wwe(c3, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  wessf1ornlem(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(hs0, crn(c1), crio(s0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0)))))), w0)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, crn(c1), crio(s0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0)))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

thm foelrnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  dffo3f(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))

blocks.name: nelrnres
blocks.content: If ` A ` is not in the range, it is not in the range of any restriction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: disjrnmpt2

blocks.origin:
thm disjrnmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, crn(c2), cv(s1)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {

thm disjrnmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚Üí ‚äî(s1 ‚àà ran(c2), s1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  con4i(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚äî(s1 ‚àà ran(c2), s1))
  sylibr(¬¨ ‚äî(s1 ‚àà ran(c2), s1), ¬¨ ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ[hs0 / s0]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  mpd(¬¨ ‚äî(s1 ‚àà ran(c2), s1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß(c1 ‚ãÇ[hs0 / s0]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ))), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà ran(c2), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà ran(c2),(hs1 ‚â† hs2 ‚àß(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  sylbi(¬¨ ‚äî(s1 ‚àà ran(c2), s1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà ran(c2), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà ran(c2),(hs1 ‚â† hs2 ‚àß(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ))), ¬¨ ‚äî(hs1 ‚àà ran(c2), hs1))
  notbii(‚äî(s1 ‚àà ran(c2), s1), ‚äî(hs1 ‚àà ran(c2), hs1))
  cbvdisjv(s1, hs1, ran(c2), s1, hs1)
  id(s1 = hs1)
  biimpi(¬¨ ‚äî(hs1 ‚àà ran(c2), hs1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà ran(c2), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà ran(c2),(hs1 ‚â† hs2 ‚àß(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  ndisj2(hs1, hs2, ran(c2), hs1, hs2)

blocks.name: elrnmpt1sf
blocks.content: Elementhood in an image set. Same as ~ elrnmpt1s , but using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrnmpt1sf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wceq(c2, c2))
  rspce(s0, c0, c1, wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c2, c5))
  nfth(s0, wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  eqeq2d(c2, c5, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  biimparc(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))
  elrnmptf(s0, c2, c3, c4, c1, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elrnmpt1sf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c2 ‚àà ran(c4))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c5)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c5 = c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà ran(c4), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 = c5))
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 = c5), c2 = c2)
  rspce(s0, c0, c1, c2 = c2, c2 = c5)
  nfth(s0, c2 = c2)
  eqid(c2)
  eqeq2d(c2, c5, c2, s0 = c0)
  biimparc(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 = c5), c2 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà ran(c4))
  elrnmptf(s0, c2, c3, c4, c1, c5)
}

blocks.content: Union expressed as an indexed union, when a map onto is given. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm founiiun0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wceq(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))))
  a1i(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wceq(cuni(c2), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0))))
  uniiun(hs0, c2)
  eqssd(ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))))
  syl(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wss(ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl(wa(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c2, csn(emptycls))))
  simpl(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantl(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c2, csn(emptycls))))
  elun1(cv(hs0), c2, csn(emptycls))
  foelrni(s0, c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls)), cv(hs0))
  reximi(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqimss2(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  iunss2(hs0, s0, c2, c1, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  pm2.61dan(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wss(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl(wa(wfo(c0, c1, cun(c2, csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wss(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0))), wfo(c0, c1, csn(emptycls)))

  simpr((c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), s0 ‚àà c1)

  biimpi((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c2))
  bicomi((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c2))
  sylibr((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 = c3))), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü† c2), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 =(c0 ` s0)))))
  jca((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 = c3))), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 =(c0 ` s0))))

blocks.name: disjinfi
blocks.content: Only a finite number of disjoint sets can have a nonempty intersection with a finite set ` C ` (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm disjinfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cfn), wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), cfn), wbr(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cdom, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn))
  syl2anc(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn), wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2))
  id(wcel(c2, cfn))
  a1i(wcel(c2, cfn), wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2))
  ssfi(c2, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2))
  sylc(w0, wbr(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cdom, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2)), wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), universe), wfo(cmpt(hs0, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), crio(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)))), cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))))
  syl(w0, wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), universe), wa(wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  jca(w0, wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2), wcel(c2, cfn))
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2))

blocks.name: fvovco
blocks.content: Value of the composition of an operator, with a given function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvovco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, cxp(c4, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {

  fveq2d(c0, cfv(c1, c2), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, c2), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cxp(c4, c5)))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, cxp(c4, c5), c3, w0)

  df-ov(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))
}

blocks.name: ssnnf1octb
blocks.content: There exists a bijection between a subset of ` NN ` and a given nonempty countable set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

thm ssnnf1octb(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wne(c0, emptycls)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wne(c0, emptycls)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0)))
  nnfoctb(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wne(c0, emptycls)), wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))))
  a1i(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wne(c0, emptycls)), wi(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0)))))
  mpd(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))), wrex(hs1, cpw(cn), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))))
  wessf1orn(hs1, cn, cv(hs0), universe, clt, wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0))
  fofn(cv(hs0), cn, c0)
  a1i(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wcel(cn, universe))
  nnex()
  a1i(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wwe(clt, cn))
  ltwenn()
  rexlimdv(hs1, cpw(cn), wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))))
  3exp(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cn)), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cn)), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))), wss(cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cn), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0))
  3adant1(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cn)), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wss(cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cn))
  eqsstrd(cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cn, cv(hs1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cn)), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cn)), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs1)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cn)), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs1), cn))
  elpwi(cv(hs1), cn)
  3adant2(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cn)), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0))
  mpbid(wa(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))))
  simpr(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))))
  f1oeq123d(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)), cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0, wa(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))))
  eqidd(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))))
  adantl(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqcomd(cv(hs1), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))))
  f1odm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))
  adantr(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))), wceq(crn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  forn(cv(hs0), cn, c0)
  spcev(s0, cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cn), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0)), wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0)))
  resex(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cn), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0))
  sseq1d(cdm(cv(s0)), cn, cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(s0), cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  f1oeq123d(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0, cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0, wceq(cv(s0), cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  dmeq(cv(s0), cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eqidd(c0, wceq(cv(s0), cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.w(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wex(s0, wa(wss(cdm(cv(s0)), cn), wf1o(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), c0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cn), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wf1o.s(s0, cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.cres.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ mapdm0 as of 3-Dec-2021. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm mapdm0OLD(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls)))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wral(hs0, co(c0, cmap, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, co(c0, cmap, emptycls), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, emptycls))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wf(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  elmapg(c0, c1, emptycls, universe, cv(hs0))
  f0bi(cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wral(hs0, co(c0, cmap, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))), wne(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), emptycls))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wne(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls)))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(emptycls, emptycls, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wf(emptycls, emptycls, c0))
  f0(c0)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(emptycls, emptycls, c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  elmapg(c0, c1, emptycls, universe, emptycls)
  ne0i(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls))
  eqsn(hs0, co(c0, cmap, emptycls), emptycls)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cmap, emptycls))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
}

blocks.content: There is a bijection between the set of positive integers and the Cartesian product of the set of positive integers with itself. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: rnmptssd
blocks.content: The range of an operation given by the maps-to notation as a subset. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: projf1o
blocks.content: A biijection from a set to a projection in a two dimensional space. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

thm projf1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üî({ c2 } √ó c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < c2, s0 >)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî({ c2 } √ó c1)), ((c0 : c1 ‚Ü£({ c2 } √ó c1))‚àß(c0 : c1 ‚Ü†({ c2 } √ó c1))))
  jca(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£({ c2 } √ó c1)), (c0 : c1 ‚Ü†({ c2 } √ó c1)))
  sylibr(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Ü£({ c2 } √ó c1)), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí({ c2 } √ó c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1)))))
  jca(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí({ c2 } √ó c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, ((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))
  3expb(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c1, ((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))
  ex((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  syl2anc(((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)), hs0 = hs1, w0, < c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 >)
  simpl1(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c1, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))
  3eqtrd(< c2, hs0 >, < c2, hs1 >, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` hs1), ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)))
  adantr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), < c2, hs0 > =(c0 ` hs0))
  3adant3(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c1, < c2, hs0 > =(c0 ` hs0))
  eqcomd(< c2, hs0 >, (c0 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  simpr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))
  adantr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` hs1)= < c2, hs1 >)
  3adant2(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c1, (c0 ` hs1)= < c2, hs1 >)
  fvmptd3(hs0, c0, hs1, < c2, hs1 >, c1, < c2, hs0 >, universe, (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1))
  opeq2(hs0, hs1, c2)
  simpr(w0, hs1 ‚àà c1)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), < c2, hs1 > ‚àà ùïå)
  opex(c2, hs1)
  simprd((w0 ‚àß < c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 >), hs0 = hs1, c2 = c2)
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß < c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 >), (c2 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = hs1), < c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 >)
  simpr(w0, < c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 >)
  adantr(w0, < c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 >, (< c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 > ‚Üî(c2 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = hs1)))
  syl2anc(w0, (< c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 > ‚Üî(c2 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = hs1)), c2 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(w0, hs1 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs1)
  opthg2(c2, c3, hs1, universe, c2, hs0)
  dff13(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, ({ c2 } √ó c1))
  sylibr(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Ü†({ c2 } √ó c1)), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí({ c2 } √ó c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 =(c0 ` hs0)))))
  jca(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí({ c2 } √ó c1)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 =(c0 ` hs0))))
  fmptd(hs0, c0, c1, ({ c2 } √ó c1), < c2, hs0 >, w0)
  eqtri(c0, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < c2, hs0 >), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ < c2, s0 >))
  cbvmptv(s0, hs0, c1, < c2, s0 >, < c2, hs0 >)
  ralrimiva(hs1, ({ c2 } √ó c1), w0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 =(c0 ` hs0)))
  mpd((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 =(c0 ` hs0)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 = < c2, hs0 >))
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 = < c2, hs0 >), hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1))
  simpr(w0, hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1), (hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 = < c2, hs0 >)))
  syl(w0, (hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 = < c2, hs0 >)), c2 ‚àà c3)
  elsnxp(hs0, c2, c3, hs1, c1)
  reximdva(hs0, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1)), hs1 = < c2, hs0 >, hs1 =(c0 ` hs0))
  adantlr(w0, hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1), hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs1 = < c2, hs0 > ‚Üí hs1 =(c0 ` hs0)))
  ex((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), hs1 = < c2, hs0 >, hs1 =(c0 ` hs0))
  eqtr2d(hs1, (c0 ` hs0), < c2, hs0 >, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs1 = < c2, hs0 >))
  adantr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), hs1 = < c2, hs0 >, (c0 ` hs0)= < c2, hs0 >)
  fvmptd3(s0, c0, hs0, < c2, hs0 >, c1, < c2, s0 >, ({ c2 } √ó c1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  opeq2(s0, hs0, c2)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), < c2, hs0 > ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1), c2 ‚àà { c2 }, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà { c2 })
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà { c2 }, c2 ‚àà c3)
  snidg(c2, c3)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  opelxpi(c2, { c2 }, hs0, c1)
  adantl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), hs1 = < c2, hs0 >, < c2, hs0 > = hs1)
  eqcomd(< c2, hs0 >, hs1, hs1 = < c2, hs0 >)
  id(hs1 = < c2, hs0 >)
  dffo3(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, ({ c2 } √ó c1))
  df-f1o(c0, c1, ({ c2 } √ó c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(({ c2 } √ó c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(< c2, s0 >)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(< c2, hs1 >)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà({ c2 } √ó c1)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

blocks.name: fvmap
blocks.content: Function value for a member of a set exponentiation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  id(w0)
  ffvelrnda(c1, c4, c0, c2, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(c0, c4, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c4)), wf(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  elmapg(c2, c3, c4, c5, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà c2, w0, c1 ‚àà c4)
  id(w0)
  ffvelrnda(c1, c4, c0, c2, w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c0 : c4 ‚Üí c2), c0 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Üî(c0 : c4 ‚Üí c2)), c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c5)
  elmapg(c2, c3, c4, c5, c0)
}

blocks.name: fidmfisupp
blocks.content: A function with a finite domain is finitely supported. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fidmfisupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn, cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, csupp, c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, c4))
  suppimacnv(c0, universe, c1, c4)
  fisuppfi(c0, cdif(universe, csn(c1)), c2, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn)), wfun(c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, c4))
  ffund(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wf(c0, c2, c3), wcel(c2, cfn))
  fex(c0, c2, c3, cfn)
  funisfsupp(c0, universe, c1, c4)
}

thm fidmfisupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[finSupp]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c2 ‚Üí c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[finSupp]c1, (c0[supp]c1)‚àà Fin)
  eqeltrd((c0[supp]c1), cfn, (`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c1 })), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[supp]c1)=(`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c1 })), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c4)
  suppimacnv(c0, universe, c1, c4)
  fisuppfi(c0, (ùïå \ { c1 }), c2, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[finSupp]c1 ‚Üî(c0[supp]c1)‚àà Fin), Fun(c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c4)
  ffund(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, (c0 : c2 ‚Üí c3), c2 ‚àà Fin)
  fex(c0, c2, c3, cfn)
  funisfsupp(c0, universe, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: choicefi
blocks.content: For a finite set, a choice function exists, without using the axiom of choice. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: mpct
blocks.content: The exponentiation of a countable set to a finite set is countable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpct(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmap, c1), cdom, com))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com))

  sylibr(w0, (c0 : { c2 } ‚Üí c1), (c0[Fn]{ c2 } ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2 },(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c1)))
  jca(w0, c0[Fn]{ c2 }, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { c2 },(c0 ` hs0)‚àà c1))
  ralrimiva(hs0, { c2 }, w0, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà c1)
  eqeltrd((c0 ` hs0), c1, (c0 ` c2), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { c2 }))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà { c2 }, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` c2))
  fveq2d(c0, hs0, c2, hs0 ‚àà { c2 })
  elsni(hs0, c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { c2 }, (c0 ` c2)‚àà c1)
  ffnfv(hs0, c0, { c2 }, c1)
  elmapd(c0, c1, { c2 }, c3, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, { c2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  snex(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.content: Subset inheritance for set exponentiation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

thm mapss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  ex(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wss(c0, c1)), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c1, c4), wss(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c4))
  simpr(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  mapss(c1, c4, c0, c2)
  ex(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
  mpd(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wss(c0, c1), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  n0(hs0, c2)
  exlimdv(hs0, wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(c0, c1))
  ex(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(c0, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(c0, c1), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  ad4ant13(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  eqcomd(cv(hs1), cfv(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  fvmptd(hs2, cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs1), universe, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqidd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqidd(cv(hs1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  vex(hs1)
  ffvelrnd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), c1, c2, wa(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  adantlr(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c2, c1))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c2, c1), wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  sseldd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c1, cmap, c2), co(c0, cmap, c2), wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  simplr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c2, c0))
  fmpttd(hs2, c2, cv(hs1), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))
  elmapd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c0, c2, c3, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c2, c5))
  elmapi(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c1, c2)
  simplr(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  dfss3(hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm mapss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
} = {
  impbid(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))
  ex(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c1), (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2), c1 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà c4)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  mapss(c1, c4, c0, c2)
  ex(w0, (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2), c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  mpd((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)), c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(w0, (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2), ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà c2))
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà c2), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  n0(hs0, c2)
  exlimdv(hs0, (w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ex((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  sylibr(((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c1))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, ((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), hs1 ‚àà c1)
  eqeltrd(hs1, c1, ((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1)` hs0), (((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  ad4ant13(w0, (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 =((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1)` hs0))
  eqcomd(hs1, ((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1)` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  fvmptd(hs2, (hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1), hs0, hs1, c2, hs1, universe, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  eqidd((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  eqidd(hs1, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs2 = hs0))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), hs1 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs1)
  ffvelrnd((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1), hs0, c1, c2, (((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  adantlr((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c0, ((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1): c2 ‚Üí c1))
  syl(((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), ((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1): c2 ‚Üí c1), (hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1)‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))
  sseldd((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1), (c1[‚Ü¶]c2), (c0[‚Ü¶]c2), ((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  simplr(w0, (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2), hs1 ‚àà c0)
  adantlr(w0, (c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2), hs1 ‚àà c0, (hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1)‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c2))
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), (hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1)‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c2), ((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1): c2 ‚Üí c0))
  fmpttd(hs2, c2, hs1, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  simplr(w0, hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2 ‚àà c2)
  elmapd((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1), c0, c2, c3, c5, (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà c3)
  adantr(w0, hs1 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà c5)
  elmapi((hs2 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ hs1), c1, c2)
  simplr((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c0)
  dfss3(hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  diff.hs1.w(((w0 ‚àß(c0[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c1[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: fsneq
blocks.content: Equality condition for two functions defined on a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

thm fsneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, csn(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, c4))
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), wfn(c0, c4), wfn(c1, c4))
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c4, c1)
  impbid(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  ex(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c4), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, c4))
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, csn(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  snidg(c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csn(c2), c4))
  eqcomi(csn(c2), c4)
  simpr(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  rspcva(hs0, c2, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  ex(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c4, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  adantll(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpl(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantl(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  fveq2d(c0, cv(hs0), c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantl(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, c2)))
  fveq2d(c1, cv(hs0), c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  sylib(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), c4, csn(c2))
  velsn(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))))
}

thm fsneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 = c1 ‚Üî(c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 = { c2 }
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Fn]c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[Fn]c4)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 = c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))), c0[Fn]c4, c1[Fn]c4)
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c4, c1)
  impbid(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  ex(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), c2 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  adantr(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)), c2 ‚àà c4)
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, { c2 }, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà { c2 }, c2 ‚àà c3)
  snidg(c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, { c2 } = c4)
  eqcomi({ c2 }, c4)
  simpr(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  rspcva(hs0, c2, c4, (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  eqeq12d((c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c1 ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  ex(w0, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c4, (w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)), (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  adantll(w0, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  3eqtr4d((c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c1 ` c2), ((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  simpl((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ‚àà c4)
  adantl((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` c2))
  fveq2d(c0, hs0, c2, hs0 ‚àà c4)
  adantl((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1 ` hs0)=(c1 ` c2))
  fveq2d(c1, hs0, c2, hs0 ‚àà c4)
  sylib(hs0 ‚àà c4, hs0 = c2, hs0 ‚àà { c2 })
  biimpi(hs0 ‚àà c4, hs0 ‚àà { c2 })
  eleq2i(hs0, c4, { c2 })
  velsn(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)))
}

blocks.content: Difference of two sets exponentiations. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

thm difmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wral(hs0, co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  eldifd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c2), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wcel(c0, c3), wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0))
  difssd(c0, c1, w0)
  mapss(c0, c3, cdif(c0, c1), c2)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)))
  mtbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wn(wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  n0(hs1, c2)
  exlimdv(hs1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wn(wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wn(wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  pm2.65da(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  adantll(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  ffvelrnd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, c2, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1))
  ad4ant23(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wn(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wn(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(c0, c1)))
  ffvelrnd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cdif(c0, c1), c2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, cdif(c0, c1)))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), c2)
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  eldifn(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0, c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5))
  elmapg(c1, c4, c2, c5, cv(hs0))
  dfss3(hs0, co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  diff.hs1.w(wn(wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))

thm difmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ((c0[‚Ü¶]c2)\(c1[‚Ü¶]c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)

} = {

  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2)‚äÜ(c0[‚Ü¶]c2), c0 ‚àà c3, (c0 \ c1)‚äÜ c0)
  difssd(c0, c1, w0)
  mapss(c0, c3, (c0 \ c1), c2)

  mpd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2)), ¬¨(hs0 : c2 ‚Üí c1), ‚àÉ(hs1, hs1 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2), ‚àÉ(hs1, hs1 ‚àà c2))

  ex((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2)), hs1 ‚àà c2, ¬¨(hs0 : c2 ‚Üí c1))
  pm2.65da(((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2))‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2), (hs0 : c2 ‚Üí c1), (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà c1)
  adantll((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2)), hs1 ‚àà c2, (hs0 : c2 ‚Üí c1), (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà c1)
  ffvelrnd(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, (hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(hs0 : c2 ‚Üí c1)))

  syl((hs0 ‚àà((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2), ¬¨(hs0 ` hs1)‚àà c1, (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà(c0 \ c1))
  ffvelrnd(hs0, hs1, (c0 \ c1), c2, (hs0 ‚àà((c0 \ c1)[‚Ü¶]c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2))

thm unirnmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)))

} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(c0, co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1))))

  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wrex(hs2, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs0))))

  rspcev(hs2, cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs2))))
  eleq2d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs2)), crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))

thm unirnmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ(ran(‚ãÉ c0)[‚Ü¶]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ(c3[‚Ü¶]c1))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ(ran(‚ãÉ c0)[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(ran(‚ãÉ c0)[‚Ü¶]c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, hs0 ‚àà(ran(‚ãÉ c0)[‚Ü¶]c1))
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà(ran(‚ãÉ c0)[‚Ü¶]c1), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí ran(‚ãÉ c0)))
  sylibr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí ran(‚ãÉ c0)), (hs0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(‚ãÉ c0))))
  jca((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), hs0[Fn]c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(‚ãÉ c0)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(‚ãÉ c0))
  syl6eleqr((hs0 ` hs1), ran(‚ãÉ c0), ‚ãÉ(hs2 ‚àà c0, ran(hs2)), ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1))
  sylibr(((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ‚ãÉ(hs2 ‚àà c0, ran(hs2)), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(hs2)))
  syl2anc(((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(hs2)), hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(hs0))
  simplr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c1)
  ffvelrnda(hs1, c1, hs0, ran(hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0))
  sylib((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí ran(hs0)), hs0[Fn]c1)
  syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), hs0[Fn]c1, hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1))
  sselda(hs0, c0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c1), w0)
  elmapfn(hs0, c3, c1)
  dffn3(hs0, c1)
  rspcev(hs2, hs0, c0, (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(hs0), (hs0 ` hs1)‚àà ran(hs2))
  eleq2d((hs0 ` hs1), ran(hs2), ran(hs0), hs2 = hs0)
  rneq(hs2, hs0)
  eliun(hs2, (hs0 ` hs1), c0, ran(hs2))
  rnuni(hs2, c0)
  ffnfv(hs1, hs0, c1, ran(‚ãÉ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚àà(ran(‚ãÉ c0)[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Üî(hs0 : c1 ‚Üí ran(‚ãÉ c0))))
  elmapd(hs0, ran(‚ãÉ c0), c1, universe, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, ran(‚ãÉ c0)‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl(w0, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexd(c0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c1), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c3, cmap, c1, w0)

  dfss3(hs0, c0, (ran(‚ãÉ c0)[‚Ü¶]c1))

blocks.content: Intersection of two sets exponentiations. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

thm inmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  eqssd(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)), wral(hs0, cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2)), wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, c0), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c0), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c1)))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c1)))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  fin(cv(hs0), c1, c0, c2)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2))))
  elmapd(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2), c1, universe, c5, w0)
  ssexd(cin(c0, c2), c0, c3, w0)
  dfss3(hs0, cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1))
  ssind(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(c0, c3), wss(cin(c0, c2), c0))
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c0, c2), c0))
  inss1(c0, c2)
  mapss(c0, c3, cin(c0, c2), c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), wcel(c2, c4), wss(cin(c0, c2), c2))
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c0, c2), c2))
  inss2(c0, c2)
  mapss(c2, c4, cin(c0, c2), c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1))
}

thm inmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1))=((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
} = {
  eqssd(((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), ((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, ((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1))‚äÜ((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), hs0 ‚àà((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), w0, hs0 ‚àà((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1))
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1))), hs0 ‚àà((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  sylibr(hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)), ((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c0)‚àß(hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)))
  jca(hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c0), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  syl(hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c0), hs0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1))
  elinel1(hs0, (c0[‚Ü¶]c1), (c2[‚Ü¶]c1))
  elmapi(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl(hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), hs0 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c1))
  elinel2(hs0, (c0[‚Ü¶]c1), (c2[‚Ü¶]c1))
  elmapi(hs0, c2, c1)
  fin(hs0, c1, c0, c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), (hs0 ‚àà((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Üî(hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ c2))))
  elmapd(hs0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2), c1, universe, c5, w0)
  ssexd((c0 ‚ãÇ c2), c0, c3, w0)
  dfss3(hs0, ((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)), ((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1))
  ssind(((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1), (c0[‚Ü¶]c1), (c2[‚Ü¶]c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1)‚äÜ(c0[‚Ü¶]c1), c0 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ c0)
  a1i(w0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ c0)
  inss1(c0, c2)
  mapss(c0, c3, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2), c1)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1)‚äÜ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1), c2 ‚àà c4, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ c2)
  a1i(w0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ c2)
  inss2(c0, c2)
  mapss(c2, c4, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2), c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(((c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚ãÇ(c2[‚Ü¶]c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)[‚Ü¶]c1))
}

blocks.name: fcoss
blocks.content: Composition of two mappings. Similar to ~ fco , but with a weaker condition on the domain of ` F ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: fsneqrn
blocks.content: Equality condition for two functions defined on a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsneqrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, csn(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, c4))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)))
  ex(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)))
  eleqtrd(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1), crn(c0), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c0)))
  ffvelrnd(c0, c2, crn(c0), c4, w0)
  sylib(w0, wf(c0, c4, crn(c0)), wfn(c0, c4))
  dffn3(c0, c4)
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, csn(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  snidg(c2, c3)
  eqcomd(csn(c2), c4, w0)
  rneqd(c0, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), csn(cfv(c1, c2))))
  eleqtrd(cfv(c0, c2), csn(cfv(c1, c2)), crn(c1), wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wceq(crn(c1), csn(cfv(c1, c2))))
  rnsnf(c1, c2, c3, universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(c1, csn(c2), universe), wf(c1, c4, universe))
  sylib(w0, wf(c1, c4, universe), wfn(c1, c4))
  dffn2(c1, c4)
  feq2d(c1, c4, universe, csn(c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c4, csn(c2)))
  elsni(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))
  fsneq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wfn(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c4))
}

thm fsneqrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 = c1 ‚Üî(c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 = { c2 }
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Fn]c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[Fn]c4)
} = {
  impbid(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1))
  ex(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1))
  eleqtrd((c0 ` c2), ran(c1), ran(c0), (w0 ‚àß c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c0))
  ffvelrnd(c0, c2, ran(c0), c4, w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0 : c4 ‚Üí ran(c0)), c0[Fn]c4)
  dffn3(c0, c4)
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, { c2 }, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà { c2 }, c2 ‚àà c3)
  snidg(c2, c3)
  eqcomd({ c2 }, c4, w0)
  rneqd(c0, c1, (w0 ‚àß c0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, c0 = c1)
  ex(w0, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1), c0 = c1)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1)), c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  syl((w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1)), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), (c0 ` c2)‚àà {(c1 ` c2)})
  eleqtrd((c0 ` c2), {(c1 ` c2)}, ran(c1), (w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1)))
  simpr(w0, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1))
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1), ran(c1)= {(c1 ` c2)})
  rnsnf(c1, c2, c3, universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c1 : { c2 } ‚Üí ùïå), (c1 : c4 ‚Üí ùïå))
  sylib(w0, (c1 : c4 ‚Üí ùïå), c1[Fn]c4)
  dffn2(c1, c4)
  feq2d(c1, c4, universe, { c2 }, w0)
  a1i(w0, c4 = { c2 })
  elsni((c0 ` c2), (c1 ` c2))
  fsneq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1)))
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1), c2 ‚àà c3)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1), c0[Fn]c4)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)‚àà ran(c1), c1[Fn]c4)
}

blocks.name: difmapsn
blocks.content: Difference of two sets exponentiatiated to a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
